ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Boxes, & FREE 1000 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
24 Cameras: 1/3" SONY SUPER HAD CCD II Indoor Camera, MICROPHONE, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65.6 feet IR Distance. OSD Menu. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on). Metal vandal proof
32 Channel DVR with 6TB HDD: H.264 960H Realtime. 960×480 & 30fps recording. D1mode/960Hmode：30fps playback. Playback Channel: 1/4/9/16 Channel. Supports HDMI & VGA outputs.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Professional CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 32 Channel 960H DVR 6TB HDD Real Time Recording+Playback, 24 Cameras 650 TV Lines Build-In MICROPHONE , iPhone Android Viewable
